title: COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS MANAGEMENT
description:
Want to motivate your teams to focus on your organisation’s strategic objectives? But don’t know the best approach to remuneration? If you’re an HR professional who wants to develop a comprehensive understanding of strategic rewarding, this programme is for you. 

The way your company approaches compensation and benefits can make a real difference to performance. So discover how to drive motivation and engagement – and get the dynamics of reward and compensation working for you.

sections.heading: Module 1: Strategic rewards unveiled
sections.content:
Gain a deep understanding of the thinking and techniques you need to align reward to your company’s strategic goals. In this highly-engaging programme, you’ll interact with your peers and experts, take part in discussions and share insights. 

Over 5 thought-provoking days, you’ll learn approaches that you can implement immediately to create real impact in your organisation. You’ll enhance your company – and your career.  

Module 1: Strategic rewards unveiled  
Discover how to position rewards
Learn to align rewards with strategy 
Experience Total Rewards in practice
Module 2: AI in rewards management 
Apply artificial intelligence in rewards  
Understand data-driven insights  
Explore Total Rewards AI use cases
Module 3: Great communications 
Discover the power of communicating rewards  
Explore pay transparency 
Dive into Total Reward Statements 
Module 4: Pay differentiation 
Make “pay for performance” work 
Understand pay fairness  
Putting the lens on base pay  
Module 5: Deep dive into reward design 
Learn how to customise rewards  
View supplementary pensions through a strategic reward lens
Learning about benchmarking and market positioning   
Module 6: Creating real impact
Perform a reward audit on your organisation
Share experiences and best practice
Get experienced advice on your organisation's challenges
